name: Polarize (Eduardo Tassi)
description:
2019 Indie Cade Europe Show&Tell Showcase

Polarize puts you in the perspective of a polar bear, animal species considered the emblem of climate change. 

Interact with other bears to discover the devastating effects that multi-million companies have on the environment. This game is greatly inspired by John Carpenter's movie They Live.

Polarize is a deliberately thought-provoking game, which aims to raise awareness of the consequences that our lifestyle and daily choices have on us and our planet.

Original Music composed by Will Savino: http://www.willsavino.net
